page.title: 19LEISURE FACILITIES,TELFORD
page.content: The{Little Dawley Snooker and Pool {Club}caters for the over 11's.It has 17 Snooker Tables and 2 Pool Tables, 1 arcade game and 1 fruit machine.The {Phoenix Centre}takes any age in.They have 4 Tennis Courts which are used most days in the Summer.There is a gymnasium and sports halls.They teach Short Tennis to over 8'S and it costs 20p.{Dawley Park}has 1 shale and 2 tarmac tennis courts. They have 1 bowling green and a putting green.The {Web}youth club accepts any age.They often go for outings.The 5-a-side lets children go on to play after school. The{Ice Rink}at the Town Centre caters for all ages.The Solihull Barons ice hockey team is based there.{Telford {Raquet and Fitness Centre}has indoor and outdoor Tennis, Short Tennis, Badminton,Squash,a Multi gym,Dance Studio,Snooker,Pool and Arcade Games.
